segments.text: Okay , can I ask you something direct ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha ! It's not like you've ever been one to beat around the bush .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fair enough . Give it to me straight . Did she bully you into this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , seriously . . . I really want this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I tell ya , when I got the invite , it really threw me for a loop . You've done a complete 180 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But things have changed . I guess I've settled down .
segments.speaker: S2
